ISSUE.TITLE: Filter not showing all the result after selection
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue Summary Filter option. ### Steps to Reproduce Please take a look at https://demo.redash.io/queries/1699 query Expected behaviour was when one selects date, UI should show all the records for that day which is not happening.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Return meaningful error when there is no cached result. Previously it was crashing as it was trying to access an unreferenced variables (query_result).

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix #1052: filter not working for date/time values
